reviewText: love the movie after all legend Dilip and Vijantimala

PLAYED BY THE VETERANS OF SUCH AS DILIP KUMAR AND VIJYANTIMALA WITH THE HIT SONGS,MUSIC AND THE FOLK DANCES TO ADD TO THIS STORY OF MORALS AS DILIP ALWAYS CHOOSES THE ROLES OF PLAYING GOOD AGAINST THE EVIL. OTHER OF THE HIT MOVIES BY THE PLAERYS ARE MADHUMATI,MUGHAL E AZAM AND ANDAZ AS WELL AS MELA.
